articles.title: Uddhav Thackeray resigns ahead of floor test, BJP set to return with Sena rebels
articles.description: Former Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis hopes to be back in power with the help of 39 Shiv Sena rebel MLAs led by Eknath Shinde, independents and legislators of smaller parties.

articles.title: The significance of PM Modi’s visit to the UAE
